XII.i.3.E.3.e
.
Consideration for Payments to Children or Parents With No Surviving Spouse
In cases in which there is no surviving spouse, and payment of Death Compensation or DIC to only one child or parent is barred during any period by reason of the provisions of
38 U.S.C. 5110(j)
, authorize payments during that period for the other children or parent, if otherwise in order, but
only
at the rate payable if all children or both parents were receiving payments.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section E - Allowance, Allotments, or Service Pay Under 38 U.S.C. 5110(j)
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section E
